p: With hospitals being overwhelmed with severely ill patients, treatment options for COVID-19 are very much needed. Rapid identification of such therapies is thus essential, but challenging. Repurposing of existing antiviral and immunomodulating drugs is an important strategy, because the safety profile of these drugs is well known. However, the current outbreak of SARS-CoV-2 has emphasised once again the urgent need to develop broad-spectrum antiviral drugs, not only for coronaviruses, but also for other virus families that may also be the cause of future epidemics/pandemics.
